name: House Thrungg Purge
summary: Inquisitor Estroz purges House Thrungg after members of the noble house summon the Slaaneshi daemon Merthen the Skindancer. Only three members of Thrungg survive, being off-world at the time. Sebellus Hive's manufacturing capability is crippled for months despite the timely intervention of the Inquisitor's Acolytes.
